pullrequest.title: Play logs as close to real time as possible

content.html:
@chapulina This is just a first implementation, I’d like to get some feedback on this since I’ve never touched Gazebo internals.

I would like to expand it by adding a field to the playback_control topic to change this real time factor, so you can play it at 2x, or 0.5x speed. 0.0 would disable it.

Also I would add something to the GUI to change the real time factor.
